## Protocol.Overlay.GridHighlightConfig.cellBorderColor property

The cell border color (default: transparent). Deprecated, please use rowLineColor and columnLineColor instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cellBorderColor?: DOM.RGBA;
```
